name: kiss-translator
description: A minimalist bilingual translation Extension & Greasemonkey Script
author: Gabe<yugang2002@gmail.com>

scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf build/chrome && BUILD_PATH=./build/chrome REACT_APP_CLIENT=chrome react-app-rewired build
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf build/firefox && cp -r build/chrome build/firefox && cat ./build/firefox/manifest.firefox.json > ./build/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:web: rm -rf build/web && BUILD_PATH=./build/web REACT_APP_CLIENT=userscript react-app-rewired build
scripts.build:userscript: rm -rf build/userscript && mkdir build/userscript && cp build/web/*.user.js build/userscript/
scripts.build: pnpm build:chrome && pnpm build:edge && pnpm build:firefox && pnpm build:web && pnpm build:userscript-ios && pnpm build:userscript && pnpm build:rules
